title: UK expands COVID-19 vaccination programme to all over-25s - DTNext
description: The UK's health service on Monday declared it had hit a new  exciting milestone  in its COVID-19 vaccination programme as it confirmed that all adults aged 25 and over will be offered their first dose of a vaccine from Tuesday.

description: The bank had posted a net loss of Rs 1,529.07 crore in the same quarter of the preceding fiscal year. Sequentially, there was a net profit of Rs 165.41 crore in the December quarter of FY21.

title: Maldives Foreign Minister Elected President Of UN General Assembly - NDTV
description: Maldives Foreign Minister Abdulla Shahid was on Monday elected as President of the 76th session of the UN General Assembly, garnering 143 votes out of the 191 ballots cast.
